channel.title: [508] Restarter
channel.description:
Hi guys, i was just wondering if a restarter for a [508] is possible? the server i have often crashes and you can't log back in unless server restarts so i really need one as i can't tend to the whim of every player i get :S
Thanls for your time.

Read my original post >.<
[/quote]
I did, I was being a smartarse. You shouldn’t be using servers that crash a lot.[/quote]
RS2DV ftw

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Restarter
item.dc:creator: @cloudscape cloudscape
item.description:
@cloudscape wrote:

[quote=“firewithin3, post:6, topic:249550”][quote author=legend-scape link=topic=328914.msg2572272#msg2572272 date=1228748759]
508 source’s normally have restarter’s so u might have 1 make sure u look in every folder
[/quote]No, no they actually don’t. 508s generally don’t need restarters.

To OP: What source are you using? Try downloading the pali base instead of whatever source you have, because I’ve never heard about that problem.[/quote]

No thank’s I am using the new Butterscape 508 source and I will stick to that, and also, only post CONSTRUCTIVE comments or remain silent please, Quote from Moparisthebest.com TOS

STILL NEED A RESTARTER PLOCKS!

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Restarter
item.dc:creator: @firewithin3 firewithin3
item.description:
@firewithin3 wrote:

[quote=“legend-scape, post:7, topic:249550”][quote author=firewithin3 link=topic=328914.msg2572333#msg2572333 date=1228752270]

508 source’s normally have restarter’s so u might have 1 make sure u look in every folder
[/quote]No, no they actually don’t. 508s generally don’t need restarters.

To OP: What source are you using? Try downloading the pali base instead of whatever source you have, because I’ve never heard about that problem.

lool? i think there is mate my mate has the restarter in 1 of his 508 source files, so stfu.[/quote]“My mate has the restarter in 1 of his 508 source files, so stfu.” I didn’t know java source files could contain EXECUTABLES EMBEDDED WITHIN THEM. I guess you learn something new (that’s incorrect) every day on mscp.

Read full topic
